benchmark_details.name: SCP-116K (Science Problem and solution dataset)
benchmark_details.overview: SCP-116K is a large-scale dataset of 116,756 high-quality problem-solution pairs specifically targeting higher education across various scientific disciplines. It aims to provide a comprehensive resource for training and evaluating large language models (LLMs) in scientific reasoning.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a high-quality dataset for training and evaluating LLMs in scientific reasoning tasks, aiding the development and understanding of AI capabilities in STEM domains.

data.source: Curated problem-solution pairs extracted from heterogeneous academic sources including textbooks and documents in digital libraries.
data.annotation: Automatically extracted and rigorously filtered to ensure quality and relevance to higher education.

methodology.calculation: Accuracy calculated based on model performance benchmarks on the SCP-116K dataset.
methodology.interpretation: Higher accuracy indicates better performance of models in solving the scientific problem-solution pairs in the dataset.
methodology.baseline_results: Accuracy of models evaluated includes: o1-mini at 60.61%, QwQ-32B-preview at 56.06%.
methodology.validation: Evaluation of models against established performance benchmarks to assess the utility of SCP-116K.
